DataSourcePortable.Name: Contratos de convênio
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT CASE WHEN STATUS = 1 AND LIBERADO <> 'S' THEN 'Em liberação'
 WHEN STATUS = 1 AND LIBERADO = 'S' THEN 'Em aprovação'
 WHEN STATUS = 2 THEN 'Aprovado'
 WHEN STATUS = 3 THEN 'Encerrado'
 WHEN STATUS = 4 OR STATUS = 7 THEN 'Cancelado'
 WHEN STATUS = 5 THEN 'Suspenso'
 WHEN STATUS = 6 THEN 'Recusado'
 END STATUS,
 SUM(VALORTOTAL) VALOR,
 COUNT(STATUS) QTD,
 CASE WHEN STATUS = 1 AND LIBERADO <> 'S' THEN '../../a/g/aga_t1907_at4457_hsa91b51d1.aspx'
 WHEN STATUS = 1 AND LIBERADO = 'S' THEN '../../a/g/aga_t1907_at4458_hs33f7a221.aspx'
 WHEN STATUS = 2 THEN '../../a/g/aga_t1907_at4459_hs1914c1de.aspx'
 WHEN STATUS = 3 THEN '../../a/g/aga_t1907_at4462_hs45a67fe7.aspx'
 WHEN STATUS = 4 OR STATUS = 7 THEN '../../a/g/aga_t1907_at4460_hs24364c25.aspx'
 WHEN STATUS = 5 THEN '../../a/g/aga_t1907_at4465_hs3348943c.aspx'
 WHEN STATUS = 6 THEN '../../a/g/aga_t1907_at3436_hs9d0bdbf2.aspx'
 END URL
FROM CN_CONTRATOS
WHERE (TIPOCONTRATO IN(SELECT X.HANDLE FROM CN_TIPOSCONTRATOS X WHERE X.HANDLE = TIPOCONTRATO AND X.TIPO = 3 AND X.EHCONTRATOCONVENIO = 'S' )) AND @CRITERIOSELECAO
GROUP BY CASE WHEN STATUS = 1 AND LIBERADO <> 'S' THEN 'Em liberação'
 WHEN STATUS = 1 AND LIBERADO = 'S' THEN 'Em aprovação'
 WHEN STATUS = 2 THEN 'Aprovado'
 WHEN STATUS = 3 THEN 'Encerrado'
 WHEN STATUS = 4 OR STATUS = 7 THEN 'Cancelado'
 WHEN STATUS = 5 THEN 'Suspenso'
 WHEN STATUS = 6 THEN 'Recusado'
 END,
 CASE WHEN STATUS = 1 AND LIBERADO <> 'S' THEN '../../a/g/aga_t1907_at4457_hsa91b51d1.aspx'
 WHEN STATUS = 1 AND LIBERADO = 'S' THEN '../../a/g/aga_t1907_at4458_hs33f7a221.aspx'
 WHEN STATUS = 2 THEN '../../a/g/aga_t1907_at4459_hs1914c1de.aspx'
 WHEN STATUS = 3 THEN '../../a/g/aga_t1907_at4462_hs45a67fe7.aspx'
 WHEN STATUS = 4 OR STATUS = 7 THEN '../../a/g/aga_t1907_at4460_hs24364c25.aspx'
 WHEN STATUS = 5 THEN '../../a/g/aga_t1907_at4465_hs3348943c.aspx'
 WHEN STATUS = 6 THEN '../../a/g/aga_t1907_at3436_hs9d0bdbf2.aspx'
 END
" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="STATUS" From="A" Path="STATUS" /> <Field Alias="VALOR" From="A" Path="VALOR" /> <Field Alias="QTD" From="A" Path="QTD" /> <Field Alias="URL" From="A" Path="URL" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
